casebody.data:
REIGER
v.
GIANT EAGLE, INC. 2018-0883 Supreme Court of Ohio. September 12, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

O'Connor, C.J., and O'Donnell and DeWine, JJ., dissent.

APPEALS ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW

Appeal accepted on proposition of law No. II.

Kennedy, French, and DeGenaro, JJ., would accept the appeal on all propositions of law.
